name: Champigrowth
description:
Champigrowth is a student project where you play a mushroom (cordyceps) who infests and colonizes an anthill. Progress with drag and shot trough the several levels without dropping your spore's counter to zero.

Credits:

- Hugo Duboquet: Game Artist / Level Designer
